sense.name: cheat out of something
sense.examples: He cozened the money out of the old man. He cozened the Earl of as much as he is worth. They were cozened out of their money.

sense.name: deceive
sense.examples: He cozened not me, but his own conscience. She cozened and she kissed him. She cozened her father so that he would let her use the coach. They say they were cozened by the priest.
